177.title: Patsy and Hedy
notes:
Teen humor comic featuring Patsy Walker and her rival Hedy Wolfe. Features in this title include
  • Buzz
  • Dear Patsy
  • Hedy
  • Mickey
  • Nancy
  • Patsy and Hedy
  • Patsy Walker
  • A Patsy Walker Extra!
  • Patsy's Pals
  • The Walkers
  • Wendy Parker
  • The Wolfes
